examples: a glance through the Judas in her front door

proper noun.description: An Apostle; full name Judas Iscariot. He betrayed Jesus to the Jewish authorities in return for thirty pieces of silver; the Gospels leave his motives uncertain. Overcome with remorse, he later committed suicide.

origin: Mid 19th century: from Judas Iscariot (see Judas), because of his association with betrayal.
